name: Dead Rising: Chop Till You Drop
name_original: Dead Rising: Chop Till You Drop
description:
Frank West is a hard-edged photo journalist hell-bent on investigating
the mystery that has caused an entire mid-western town to be quarantined
and its mall overrun by zombies. With an entire mall at his disposal,
the action is over the top!
NPC's to help players navigate through the zombie-infested mall.

Open-ended environment to explore

Full mall at the player's disposal to use items for food, defense,
protection - survival!

Solve the mystery of why the entire town has turned into the undead

Take pictures to capture all the intense action to earn points and new
items
